ch.aplu.bluetooth

Class VerboseWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.bluetooth.VerboseWriter

  • public class VerboseWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to output text information either to System.out or into a log file. Call VerboseWriter.out.println() to write out the information.
